value.title: Apple avoids “AI” hype at WWDC keynote by baking ML into products
value.excerpt: Amid notable new products like the Apple Silicon Mac Pro and the Apple Vision Pro revealed at Monday's WWDC 2023 keynote event, Apple presenters never once mentioned the term "AI," a notable omission given that its competitors like Microsoft and Google have been heavily focusing on generative AI at the moment.

value.title: Scientists use machine learning to 'see' how the brain adapts to different environments

value.title: AI, Machine Learning And Automation: What Agencies Need To Know
value.excerpt: Automation refers to the use of machines to automate routine tasks that would otherwise be executed by humans. It involves configuring a set of rules and triggers to initiate actions. While automation is often complex, it lacks AI’s ability to learn from data to optimize performance.

value.title: Security Becomes Much Bigger Issue For AI/ML Chips, Tools

value.title: Scale your machine learning workloads on Amazon ECS powered by AWS Trainium instances
value.excerpt: Running machine learning (ML) workloads with containers is becoming a common practice. What you get is an ML development environment that is consistent and portable.
